snippet.title: GO MECHA BALL - ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER ☄️
snippet.description:
Get ready for Go Mecha Ball!

Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2008510/Go_Mecha_Ball/

Join the discord: https://discord.gg/D9a3e2P6Qg

Explore and conquer four distinct worlds filled with a dizzying array of rampaging robots, massive bosses and tools and obstacles straight out of a pinball table! Boost up ramps to soar above the fray and deliver death from above, launch yourself off bouncy bumpers or catch an updraft off a giant fan.

----

Follow us around the internet:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/SuperRareGames
Facebook - https://facebook.com/superraregamess
Instagram - https://instagram.com/superraregames/
Mastodon - https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@Super...
